thread.title: Business Software, Inc. Offers Payroll Onboarding Form Access on Mobile Devices
thread.title_full: Business Software, Inc. Offers Payroll Onboarding Form Access on Mobile Devices

author: Alla Umanskiy
title: Business Software, Inc. Offers Payroll Onboarding Form Access on Mobile Devices
text:
Business Software, Inc. (BSI), a leading provider of payroll onboarding, tax calculation and tax filing solutions in the cloud, is announcing that withholding and exemption certificates within its eFormsFactory™ are now available on mobile devices. eFormsFactory – BSI’s cloud-based suite of payroll onboarding solutions – now allows users to complete such forms using Windows®, Apple® and Android® mobile devices. Since eFormsFactory is an employee-facing solution, it is important that BSI offer employees the opportunity to access onboarding documents on various devices, including phones and tablets. “We are pleased to offer convenient access to eFormsFactory on mobile devices," said Russell Rindik, VP of Operations for BSI. "This new offering gives employees more options as to how and where they can access and complete or update their forms. In today’s rapidly changing world of technology, it is key to be able to provide the flexibility customers seek when it comes to software solutions."
When using eFormsFactory, employees are provided with self-service access to online payroll tax forms, while employers may access, manage and process these forms online. The solution seamlessly integrates with payroll systems to streamline efficiency, while reducing errors and business expenditures.
About BSI
BSI is a leading provider of U.S. payroll tax onboarding, tax calculation, tax filing and supporting solutions in the cloud. Leveraging more than 36 years of experience, BSI offers the most comprehensive and complete solutions in the industry. Our solutions are bundled suites collectively containing a large number of individual applications that our customers use to process more than a half billion transactions annually. Thousands of organizations – including many of the world's best known companies – use BSI to minimize their compliance risks, reduce labor costs, maintain regulatory compliance, improve workforce productivity and increase employee satisfaction. For more information, visit http://www.bsi.com .
